attributes.action: Listen to and have proper consultation with his electorate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every day the government comes up with more and ways to make life as miserable as possible. From banks getting special treatment over bank charges to smoking bans through to petrol costs and road pricing. We all sit there and do nothing. When we do we are ignored or given stats that we cannot check or comprehend. We demand action. You dont have to agree with the examples but there are too many to list. If you feel you are not listened to enough please sign.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
